name: COmplex PAthway Simulator
description: COPASI is C++ based software application for simulation and analysis of biochemical networks and their dynamics

references.title: COPASI is C++ based software application for simulation and analysis of biochemical networks and their dynamics
references.authors: Frank T. Bergmann, Stefan Hoops, Brian Klahn, Ursula Kummer, Pedro Mendes, Jürgen Pahle, Sven Shale

algorithms.name: ordinary differential equation solver for stiff or non-stiff systems with root finding

kisaoTerm.name: LSODAR
kisaoTerm.description: LSODAR is a variant of LSODA [http://identifiers.org/biomodels.kisao/KISAO_0000088] with a root finding capability added. Thus it solves problems dy/dt = f with dense or banded Jacobian and automatic method selection, and at the same time, it finds the roots of any of a set of given functions of the form g(t,y). This is often useful for finding stop conditions, or for finding points at which a switch is to be made in the function f.

modelingFrameworks.name: non-spatial continuous framework
modelingFrameworks.description: Modelling approach where the quantities of participants are considered continuous, and represented by real values. The associated simulation methods make use of differential equations. The models do not take into account the distribution of the entities and describe only the temporal fluxes.

references.title: CVODE, a stiff/nonstiff ODE solver in C
references.authors: Scott D Cohen, Alan C Hindmarsh & and Paul F Dubois

algorithms.name: Implicit Runge-Kutta methods based on Radau quadrature.
